import React from 'react'; const About = () => { return (
{/* Hero Section */}

About FurnitureHouse

We craft more than furniture — we create timeless comfort for modern homes.

{/* Brand Values */}

Our Core Values

{[ { icon: "🪵", title: "Sustainable Materials", desc: "We source only eco-friendly and responsibly harvested woods and fabrics.", }, { icon: "🎨", title: "Thoughtful Design", desc: "Each piece is designed to blend functionality with beauty in your space.", }, { icon: "🛠️", title: "Handcrafted Quality", desc: "Every item is made with precision and care by skilled artisans.", }, ].map((item, idx) => (
{item.icon}

{item.title}

{item.desc}

))}
{/* Craftsmanship Section */}

Our Craftsmanship

Behind every table leg and fabric stitch lies a story of expert hands shaping comfort and utility.

We believe in the beauty of slow production and lasting impact — no shortcuts, only excellence.

{/* Testimonials */}

What Our Customers Say

{[ { name: "Samantha R.", text: "The dining table we got from FurnitureHouse completely transformed our space. Beautiful and incredibly sturdy.", }, { name: "Kevin M.", text: "Loved the eco-conscious approach. The sofa feels luxurious but also has a warm, handmade touch to it.", }, ].map((testi, i) => (

“{testi.text}”

— {testi.name}

))}
{/* CTA */}

Discover Our Collections

Explore curated pieces built to last and designed to love.

Browse Collections
); }; export default About;
